<SPLITVIEW width="200">
	<!-- Tree View -->
	<VIEW>
		<TREEVIEW icon="keyboard_arrow_right" expandedicon="keyboard_arrow_down">
			<NODE label="BOX" expanded="true">
				<NODE label="Layout" expanded="false">
					<NODE label="Vertical" onclick="open('')" />
					<NODE label="Horizontal" onclick="open('')" />
					<NODE label="Stacked" onclick="open('')" />
				</NODE>
				<NODE label="Sizing" onclick="open('')" />
			</NODE>
			<NODE label="TEXT" expanded="true">
				<NODE label="Sizing" onclick="open('')" />
				<NODE label="Decoration" onclick="open('')" />
			</NODE>
		</TREEVIEW>
	</VIEW>
	<!-- Tab View -->
	<VIEW>
		<BOX>
			<TABVIEW tabbutton="true" tabbar="true" />
		</BOX>
	</VIEW>
</SPLITVIEW>
SPLITVIEW (utilizing Treeview + Tabview).description: A Splitview snippet with a Treeview + Tabview
